original: Kusalaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe

original: Kusalaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kusalam mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Kusalaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
